article: When George was thirty - five , he bought a small plane and learned to fly it . He soon became very good and made his plane do all kinds of tricks . George had a friend , whose name was Mark . One day George offered to take Mark up in his plane . Mark thought , " I ' ve traveled in a big plane several times , but I ' ve never been in a small one , so I ' ll go . " They went up , and George flew around for half an hour and did all kinds of tricks in the air . When they came down again , Mark was glad to be back safely , and he said to his friend in a shaking voice , " Well , George , thank you very much for those two trips in your plane . " George was very surprised and said , " Two trips ? " " Yes , my first and my last . " answered Mark .
questions: Which of the following statements is false ?

model: george and mark were not good friends .
george had some difficulty learning to fly a plane .
mark did all kinds of tricks in the air .
mark did n ' t like george ' s plane .
human: George learned to fly a plane very quickly .
It took George a short time to learn to fly a plane .
Mark decided to fly in George ' s small plane .
George had some difficulty learning to fly a plane .
